title: Simulating The U.S. Senate: An LLM-Driven Agent Approach to Modeling ...
snippet: Zarif L. Azher California Institute of Technology zazher@caltech.edu. Abstract. This study introduces a novel approach to simulating legislative processes using LLM-driven virtual agents, focusing on the U.S. Senate Intelligence Committee. We developed agents representing individual senators and placed them in simulated committee discussions.
